text: Rachana Khadka (Nepali: रचना खड्का) is Nepalese politician, belonging to CPN (Unified Marxist–Leninist). She had previously served as member of the Bagmati Provincial Assembly and Minister for Economic Affairs and Planning of Bagmati Province.She has more than fifteen years of experience in political activism, legislation as member of provincial parliament and executive leadership as a provincial minister. By education and profession, she is constitutional lawyer and specializes in the area of federalism and devolution of power. == References == Category:Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist–Leninist) politicians Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Rachana Khadka
